title: ⭐️ Grand Final Running Order ⭐️
text:
⭐️ Grand Final Running Order ⭐️
Eurovision Song Contest 2021 - Grand Final
Saturday 22 May, 21:00 CEST
Grand Final Running Order:
📺 Watch the Grand Final Live Stream on YouTube or find out how to watch in your region.
The one we've waited for... the Grand Final! Our 20 qualifying Semi-Finalists are joined by the Big Five and our hosts The Netherlands, as the 26 acts battle it out to become the Eurovision Song Contest champions 2021.
Interval act: Duncan Laurence, Afrojack, Glennis Grace and Wulf will perform in the Grand Final
Duncan Laurence will perform two songs (you can probably guess one of them) before one of the most popular DJs in the world, Afrojack, together with Glennis Grace, Wulf and a classical orchestra consisting of young talent take part in the act Music Binds Us.
Live Blog: 19:00 CEST - 02:00 CEST
Stick with us and we cover the build up, the Contest and the aftermath - live from the Delegation Bubble and Press Conference rooms in Rotterdam Ahoy.
